name: Cryptowallet
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: crypto wallet
des: Never before has it been so easy to manage your cryptocurrencies. With this skill you can make Alexa store the amount of cryptocurrencies you have among a list of more than 2000 coins. In addition, you can ask him to indicate the price of a currency, and he will calculate your total balance if you have that currency.Alexa, abre monedero de cryptomonedas
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
